units.title: Development of CellPhoneDB v.3.0
units.text: We developed CellPhoneDB v.3.0 to measure intercellular communication taking into account spatial coordinates of cells and use this tool to define cell signaling in both lumenal and glandular microenvironments.
units.rationale: Describes the creation of a computational tool for spatial cell‑cell communication analysis.

units.title: Running CellPhoneDB on microenvironments
units.text: We ran CellPhoneDB on each of the microenvironments (Supplementary Table 6) and found significant epithelial–stromal interactions (log fold change > 0.02 and false discovery rate (FDR) < 0.005).
units.rationale: Specifies how the newly developed tool was applied to distinct tissue microenvironments.

units.title: Organoid derivation and hormonal stimulation
units.text: Organoids were derived in ExM and then subjected to hormonal stimulation with estrogen (E2) followed by estrogen + progesterone (P4) + cAMP and prolactin (PRL).
units.rationale: Outlines the culture conditions and hormone treatment sequence for endometrial organoids.

units.title: Organoid collection for scRNA‑seq
units.text: The time points at which organoids were collected for scRNA‑seq are marked with an asterisk.
units.rationale: Indicates the sampling schedule for single‑cell transcriptomic profiling.

units.title: Inhibition of NOTCH and WNT pathways in organoids
units.text: Organoids were treated with inhibitors to either NOTCH (DBZ or DAPT) or WNT (IWP‑2 or XAV939) upon initiation of hormonal stimulation.
units.rationale: Details the experimental manipulation of signaling pathways during hormone exposure.

units.title: Omission of RSPO‑1 during WNT inhibition
units.text: R‑spondin‑1 (RSPO‑1) was omitted from ExM in the presence of WNT inhibitors.
units.rationale: Specifies a media modification required when blocking WNT signaling.

units.title: Validation of PAEP secretion by ELISA
units.text: We validated the increase of one secretory product, PAEP, under WNT‑inhibitory conditions by ELISA (Extended Data Fig. 9e).
units.rationale: Provides a quantitative assay to confirm hormone‑dependent secretory protein changes.

units.title: smFISH staining of uterine tissue for NOTCH2 and WNT7A
units.text: We stained uterine tissue with smFISH probes for both genes alongside EPCAM using immunohistochemistry (IHC).
units.rationale: Describes a spatial RNA detection method combined with protein labeling.

units.title: Prediction of epithelial subsets with logistic classifier
units.text: Predicted epithelial subsets of endometrial organoids using a logistic classifier.
units.rationale: Summarizes the computational step for assigning organoid cells to in‑vivo epithelial categories.
